Reviews.Title: Canon what else need be said!!
Reviews.Author: Ward
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a Rebel T3 and loved that. This takes the cake for me. First understand I am not a pro photographer I just play but love the Canon cameras as they are indeed the best you can buy!! This will produce absolutely beautiful Pics!! I've used mine in -10 below zero temps and worked quite well even though this was well below the recommended operating temps.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<5> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD DSLR Sling Backpack +
<9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> 58mm UV Filter + <11> 67mm UV Filter + <12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> LCD Screen Protectors + <15> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <16> 67-58mm Step-Down Adapter Ring
